content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 26), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍。こちら初期(19,26)から北西へ間合いを詰めつつ、初手で広域索敵を実施し先見を取る。空母は陸地に注意しつつ安全距離を保って前進。航空部隊は扇形に遠距離へ振り、左上方面の有力位置をカバー。BSQ1はやや西寄りに深く、BSQ2はさらに北西深くへ。これで早期発見を狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 17, "y": 24}, "launch_target": {"x": 6, "y": 8}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (6, 8) while at (17, 24).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 25), en route to target (17, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 24), outbound toward (6, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵は左上(3,3)近傍想定。こちらは(17,25)→(17,24)へ前進中。BSQ1を(6,8)へ向け索敵中。重複を避けつつ、BSQ2はさらに北西深くをカバーし早期発見を狙う。空母は過度に前に出ずに西北へ少しずつ寄せ、索敵扇面を維持。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 23}, "launch_target": {"x": 8, "y": 6}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (8, 6) while at (16, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 23), en route to target (16, 23), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 20), outbound toward (6, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 22), outbound toward (8, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍想定。BSQ1(→6,8)とBSQ2(→8,6)で北西を扇形索敵中。空母はさらに北西へ前進し、次ターン以降の再発艦可能範囲を拡大しつつも発見リスクを抑える。陸地帯に注意して海域を維持。発見情報が得られ次第、追撃または回避に移行。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 17) while at (13, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (8, 17) while at (13, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 17) while at (14, 18).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (10, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (8, 17) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 22), en route to target (14, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 16), outbound toward (6, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 18), outbound toward (8, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機ASQ1(10,17)・ASQ2(8,17)を同時探知。敵空母はそれらの南西〜西に位置する可能性が高いが、敵機の進路（南東寄り）から見ると敵空母は(5〜9,10〜14)周辺が有力。こちら空母は被発見リスク軽減のため即座に南西へ退避し、敵の帰還方向から母艦位置を特定する。攻撃は往路でのみ可能のため、本隊は現索敵軌道を維持して敵空母の直掩圏へ踏み込む。次の交錯で敵母艦を掴むことを狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 13, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 18) while at (12, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (9, 19) while at (12, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 19) while at (12, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (10, 20) while at (12, 15).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 20) while at (13, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 20) while at (13, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (6, 12) while at (10, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (6, 12) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 20) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 20) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 21), en route to target (13, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 13), outbound toward (6, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 14), outbound toward (8, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1を(6,12)で捕捉。こちらBSQ1は既に(6,12)へ攻撃進入中。BSQ2は(8,6)目標だが、敵母艦座標が確定したため直ちに(6,12)へ向けた往路攻撃へ変更できない（往路中は目標変更不可）ため、このまま北西からの扇面で接触継続し帰路報告も活用。空母は反撃回避のため南西へ退避し、敵攻撃機の帰還方位観測と次発艦余地の確保を行う。次ターン以降、空母位置を維持/微後退しつつ、BSQ1の打撃効果を見て追撃を図る。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (13, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 27 damage while at (13, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 22) while at (13, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (4, 11) while at (6, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (4, 11) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 20) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (14, 22) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 73/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (6, 13), outbound toward (4, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 10), outbound toward (8, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1は(4,11)へ後退中。BSQ1は攻撃進入中で決戦局面。こちら空母は被攻撃を受けつつあり、敵機ASQ2(14,22)接近で危険。空母は南西へ退避し、敵機の往復経路から敵母艦方位を引き続き推定。BSQ2は既目標(8,6)で北西側から帰路で敵位置を再確認見込み。まずは生存を優先し時間を稼ぎつつBSQ1の打撃で勝ちを狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (13, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 29 damage while at (13, 21).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 17) while at (13, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (3, 9) while at (4, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (8, 6).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 9) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (14, 22) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (4, 9), engaging an enemy target at (3, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 6), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1がAC1(3,9)に接触・攻撃中。ここで撃沈を狙う。一方こちら空母は被害44/100と危険域、敵ASQはまだ周辺(ASQ1 11,17 / ASQ2損耗24/40)。空母はさらに南西へ退避して生存を最優先。BSQ2は帰投中で再出撃準備。BSQ1の攻撃成果で決め切るプラン。次ターン以降、敵空母が生存ならBSQ2で追撃を計画。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 22 damage while at (4, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (4, 9).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 20) while at (11, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 12) while at (10, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 9) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (9, 12) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 20) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (4, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 10), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1がAC1に22ダメ与えHP73に。両隊とも帰投中で次の一撃準備が鍵。敵ASQは周辺(ASQ1 9,12 / ASQ2 11,20)で依然脅威。空母はさらに南西に退避し被弾回避しつつ、次ターン以降の発艦半径を敵空母(北西)へ伸ばす位置を確保。帰投完了次第、両隊同時に(3,9)〜(4,11)帯へ再攻撃を計画。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 9, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=9 y=21 is not on sea.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "進路指定が陸上にかかっていたため修正。空母は安全を優先しつつ海上マスを保ち、次の再発艦に備える。敵空母は北西(3,9)周辺。こちらは帰投後、同方面へ再攻撃予定。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=10 y=21 is not on sea.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "前ターンの指定が陸タイルだったため、海上タイルへ修正。現在(11,21)から安全を保ちつつ海上に留まり、両隊の帰投と再発艦準備を優先。敵空母は北西(3,9)周辺で、帰投完了後に同方面へ同時攻撃をかける。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (7, 11) while at (11, 12).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (9, 17) while at (11, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (3, 8) while at (6, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (6, 10) while at (6, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (9, 16) while at (6, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (9, 16) while at (11, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 8) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (6, 10) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (9, 16) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (6, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "敵空母は(3,8)に後退中。敵ASQは(6,10),(9,16)で依然接近圏内。こちらは両隊が帰投中で再出撃を優先、空母は現位置で防空に徹し被害回避。帰投完了次第、AC1周辺(3,8)〜(4,10)へ同時攻撃を実施する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (5, 9) while at (7, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (8, 14) while at (11, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (7, 12) while at (8, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 8) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (5, 9) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (7, 12) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (8, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(3,8)付近で後退継続。両隊は帰投直前、こちら空母は防空圏を維持しつつ海上で安全を確保。次ターン以降、両隊同時に(3,8)〜(4,10)帯へ攻撃発艦するため、空母は現位置維持で迎え入れ・整備を優先。敵ASQは(5,9),(7,12)周辺でなお接近中だが、こちら防空範囲で迎撃可。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (11, 21).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 8) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (7, 12) (previously at (8, 17)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 21), returning to the carrier, HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ2が着艦し再出撃可能。敵空母は(3,8)周辺で後退傾向。こちらはBC1を現位置で防空維持しつつ、BSQ2を先行索敵・攻撃で投入、BSQ1は直ちに合流させ次ターン以降の二段打撃へ。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 8}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (11, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (3, 8) while at (11, 20).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 8) (previously at (6, 13)), HP 73/100.
- No enemy squadrons are currently visible.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 20), outbound toward (3, 8), HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "敵空母は(3,8)周辺で後退傾向。BSQ1は既に(3,8)へ発進済み。BSQ2を同一点へ同時到達に近づけて波状ではなく同時打撃で撃沈を狙う。空母は現位置で防空を維持しつつ被害回避。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 8}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (3, 8) while at (11, 20).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 16), outbound toward (3, 8), HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 20), outbound toward (3, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊BSQ1/BSQ2が(3,8)へ突入中。敵空母は左上隅へ後退継続の可能性あり(例: 2,7 / 3,7 / 2,8)。こちら空母は防空しつつ西へ少し寄せて回収半径短縮と再攻撃余地を確保。ただし陸タイル回避のため(10,21)は×、(10,20)は海。敵機の再出現に警戒。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 20}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=10 y=20 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=11 y=18.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "空母移動先が陸だったため修正。防空を維持しつつ帰投半径を少しだけ西へ縮めるため、海上タイル(11,18)へ後退。航空隊は(3,8)方面へ同時打撃継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (4, 11) while at (7, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (6, 14) while at (7, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (6, 14) while at (9, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (4, 11) (previously at (4, 10)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (6, 14) (previously at (5, 12)), HP 17/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 19), en route to target (11, 18), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 12), outbound toward (4, 11), HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 16), outbound toward (3, 8), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(4,11)へ南東へ機動。BSQ1は目標更新済みで接敵圏内、BSQ2は(3,8)指向でやや外れる恐れがあるが往路目標変更不可のためこのまま進ませ、通過中に発見したら攻撃へ移ることを期待。こちら空母は海上で防空を維持しつつやや南へ下げて被弾リスクを抑える。次はBSQ1で与損→BSQ2か帰還後再出撃で止めを狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (7, 16) while at (5, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (6, 15) while at (5, 10).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 16) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (3, 10) while at (4, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (3, 10) while at (7, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 16) while at (7, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (7, 16) while at (7, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 10) (previously at (4, 10)), HP 73/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (9, 16) (previously at (5, 12)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (7, 16) (previously at (5, 13)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 18), en route to target (11, 18), HP 44/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (4, 9), outbound toward (3, 10), HP 18/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (7, 12), outbound toward (3, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "敵空母AC1は(3,10)。両隊は同一点へ向け進入中で好機。敵ASQは(9,16)/(7,16)で接近中だが、こちら空母は南側で防空維持し生存優先。BC1は現在位置キープ、航空隊の同時打撃で撃沈を狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 16 of 30.

Recent events:
